title: First Galaxy Z Flip 4 leak shows a largely unchanged design [Gallery]
content:
Just a few hours after the Galaxy Z Fold 4 leaked, we’re now getting a first look at the Galaxy Z Flip 4 design, which seems to be mostly unchanged.

more…

The post First Galaxy Z Flip 4 leak shows a largely unchanged design [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new leak, the Galaxy Z Flip 4 won't change the design of Samsung's best-selling foldable smartphone from what came before.
